title: Drawing, "Design for Stained Glass Memorial Window to Thomas J. Post", 20th century
medium: Pen and black ink, brush and opaque watercolors on tissue paper (mounted)
signed: in graphite (?), lower right: R. W. C.; below: R. W. Chanler 1919
dimensions: Sheet: 17.8 x 13.9 cm (7 in. x 5 1/2 in.)
creditline: Gift of Eleanor and Sarah Hewitt
description: Vertical rectangle depicting an angel that holds a torch in his right hand, and rests his left hand on a shield bearing the inscription: "THOM. J. POST AT REST AFTER A LONG LIFE OF INDUSTRY THRIFT AND SOBRIETY".

tombstone.epitaph: Drawing, "Design for Stained Glass Memorial Window to Thomas J. Post", 20th century.Pen and black ink, brush and opaque watercolors on tissue paper (mounted). Gift of Eleanor and Sarah Hewitt. 1931-94-260.
